knimeNode.name: Time Difference
knimeNode.shortDescription: Appends the difference between two dates.

fullDescription.intro: Appends the difference between two dates with the selected aggregation level (year, quarter, month, week, day, hour, minute) and a selected precision for rounding. For the second date/time there are three possibilites. The node can be configured to use the time at execution, the entires of a second column or a fixed date/time.
fullDescription.option: Select the column containing the start date
Select a second column containing the end date
Select a fixed time as the end date.
The granularity of the difference (in years, quarters, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes)
Name of the newly appended column containing the time difference

ports.inPort: In data with at least one date columns
ports.outPort: Out data with the time difference appended
